    • Method Detail

      • eat

        public boolean eat()
        Workers eat one unit of honey a day and gain a health point if successful, they lose a health point if not.
        Specified by:
        eat in class Bee
        Returns:
        Whether this Worker successfully ate
        See Also:
        Bee.eat()

      • work

        private void work()
        The Worker attempts to collect all the pollen from two random flowers in the garden, then attempts to turn it into food.

      • makeFood

        private void makeFood(int pollen)
        Turns pollen into food and adds it to the Bees Hive. If there are at least two units of pollen available, the Worker creates a Royal Jelly. Any remaining pollen (if any) is turned into honey.
        Parameters:
        pollen - The number of units of pollen this Worker can use to make with food with

        Description copied from class: Bee
        Daily tasks of a Bee. Called every simulation "tick"
        Specified by:
        anotherDay in class Bee
        Returns:
        The Bee after the day (potentially may be a different type)
        See Also:
        Bee.anotherDay()
